name: Living Cloudkill
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Amorphous: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
traits.Magic Resistance: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.
actions.Magical Strike: Melee Spell Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (5d6 + 5) poison damage.
actions.Spell Mimicry (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The living spell creates a 40-foot-diameter sphere of fog within 60 feet of it (the fog spreads around corners). When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a DC 16+1d6 + 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
